Text: Have initially seeded just over 35 GB so far, and could use some help keeping this torrent afloat. Remember to share back, fellow pirates.
Anybody else have a problem where the video freezes permanently after 2 seconds of playing in MPC-HC? Works fine in VLC, but I'd prefer the higher quality playback.
^ If anybody else has that problem, disable ffdshow DXVA in your CCCP settings.
After downloading this, I will seed for a very long time.

Worked great, love the anime so far, love the torrent, love the quality.

Well done and nicely put together.

Downloaded this and all I'm seeing is English dub. I have ffdshow and CCCP, so, if there's something else that's needed, any help would be much obliged. Ugh, the English dub for this show is beyond awful.

Figured it out. Apparently Windows Media Player is a little doplic when it comes to these files. Realized I never installed the Divx Player so I went and pulled that off of the Interwebs. Problem solved. Now, if I can only upload them to my mobile in Japanese...
